name: @oas-tools/oas-telemetry
description: This package exports an Express middleware that traces requests and responses of an Express application using OpenTelemetry.
author: Manuel Otero

scripts.build: npm run build -w packages/ui && npm run build -w packages/lib
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev -w packages/lib" "npm run dev -w packages/ui"
scripts.esm: echo 'Remember to execute: "npm run build"' && node test/functional/otTestServer.mjs
scripts.cjs: echo 'Remember to execute: "npm run build"' && node test/functional/otTestServer.cjs
